title: Pet-friendly community with fenced in dog park, Wine Room, Game Room
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "Conveniently located in Westminster, Colorado, halfway between Denver's central business district and Boulder County and ensconced against breathtaking and idyllic mountain scenery, Westcliff Apartments will not disappoint!", "Featuring one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with stainless steel appliances, upgraded kitchens and the largest square footage in the area, Westcliff is Westminster's premiere apartment community.", 'Call or visit us today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Full-size Washer and Dryer Included', 'Built-in Bookcases', 'Expansive mountain views', 'Crown Molding Accented with Two-tone Paint', 'Large Walk-in Closets', 'Newly Redesigned Kitchens', 'Vaulted Ceilings on Upper Floors', 'Outdoor Spa', "9' ceilings", 'Brand New Hardwood Floors', 'Pet-friendly community with fenced in dog park', 'Strength and Cardio Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
